item.title: About me
item.description:
Personal Profile

Basic Information Name: Jiang Jinheng

Gender: Male

Currently Studying: Communication Engineering at Zhengzhou University (expected to transfer to Computer Science and Technology)

Interested in and Expected Direction of Study

In terms of competitions, I am particularly interested in algorithm competitions such as ACM-ICPC. During my college years, I plan to participate in such competitions and strive to win awards.

As for my future development direction, I currently want to focus on machine learning and deep learning, but I’m not sure yet. It depends on my luck.

Hobbies

Hobbies are not many, mainly playing games, and the games I play are mostly from the Souls-like, ARPG, ACT, and Roguelite genres. I also enjoy sandbox games like Minecraft.

Here are a few games that I really enjoy:

Bloodborne

Dark Souls 3

Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice

Red Dead Redemption 2 (also known as RDR2)

Black Myth: The Monkey King

Dead Cells

If you want to chat about games, you can contact me at:https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198365257706/and Playstation platform

Other Contact Information:

QQ:2916321268

WeChat: 136 1376 3761

QQ Mail: 2917321268@qq.com

Outlook Email Address: q2917321268@outlook.com

Gmail email address: jjhcx330jinheng@gmail.com

item.title: Announcement
item.description:
The main content of this website

This website mainly shares relevant hardcore content such as daily learning materials and some professional knowledge, and exchanges knowledge and insights with everyone.

Some features of this website

Basic Functions: Search, Sorting, Archiving…

Some special features: a board girl (supports changing outfits, switching characters, mouse interaction…), bright/dark mode switch.

Future possible new features: mouse cursor style changes, font changes…

Attention

Chinese users may experience a slower loading time when accessing the website and viewing the dashboard girl. Please be patient.

Finally

Welcome to my website!
